character_name: James Bond: A British MI6 officer newly assigned 00 status
Vesper Lynd: An agent for Her Majesty's Treasury assigned to supervise Bond and finance him in a high-stakes poker game.
Le Chiffre: A banker who services many of the world's criminals and terrorists and associate partner of Spectre
Ren√© Mathis: Bond's contact in Montenegro.
Mr. White: A liaison for an unnamed criminal organization (the nature of this group is explored more in the next film Quantum of Solace).
M: The head of MI6. Although she feels she has promoted Bond too soon and chides him for his rash actions
Villiers: M's young secretary at MI6 headquarters. His character's last name is a reference to James Villiers
Steven Obanno: A leader of the Lord's Resistance Army
Alex Dimitrios: A contractor in the international criminal underworld and associate of Le Chiffre
Valenka: Le Chiffre's girlfriend and henchwoman
Solange Dimitrios: Dimitrios's wife; Bond seduces her
Carlos: A terrorist employed by Le Chiffre to blow up an aircraft.
Mollaka: A bomb-maker pursued by Bond through a construction site in Madagascar. Credited in opening title cards under "Free running stunts".
